entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:23 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -36.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
